data.Name: Caifanes
data.Description: PARKING: All cars enter the park on the south side of Ruby Hill Park on Jewell Avenue. Follow signs and the flaggers who will direct you on the best place to park. If you require ADA parking, please tell the attendant upon entering and they will direct you to these spaces. ADA parking is located right outside of the main entrance. Parking on the park grass is illegal and violators will be ticketed or towed. ENTRY: General Admission guests will enter via the gate on the grass located near the main entrance. RULES: Lawn chairs, picnic blankets, food (with plastic utensils), empty water bottles and factory sealed beverages allowed. Alcohol, marijuana, glass and weapons are strictly prohibited. WEATHER: All shows are rain or shine.

data.Name: Caifanes
data.Bio: Caifanes -founded in 1987, is a rock band that achieved fame throughout the late 80’s and early 90’s in Latin America and gained recognition in the U.S. The band formed in Mexico City - Mexico and its original lineup consisted of Saúl Hernández (vocals & guitar), Sabo Romo (bass guitar), Alfonso André (drums) and Diego Herrera (keyboards and saxophone). Argentinean guitarist Alejandro Marcovich joined in 1989. Caifanes are considered to be Read more on Last.fm
